text: Ray is the master of making sure minor arguments never grow into Things.

name: c_dizzle
text: There are certain strips that emulate the peak of benevolence each character is capable of...I think this is (one of) Ray's. Anyone have others?

text: There's been a couple of occasions when Lie Bot has used his lies for good, especially when it comes to sparing Phillipe's feelings.

name: dejavroom
text: A comment left by dejavroom was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by dayvancowboy, kylank, Connellingus, keithcozz)

name: thommy_h
text: I like how Ray explains to Teodore that Robert Smith is The Cure's "main singer". Like this is something Robert Smith would actually say to people on the phone (I don't actually know for certain that he doesn't, btw, so if Robert is reading this then I'm sorry for misrepresenting your phone-habits).

name: ferdinand
text: i like how robert smith says "dogg."

name: spinynorman
text:
I am waiting for the day when I'm in some bar and I see that Onstad's Robert Smith and BATHS ONLY tattooed on someone's arm.

I just won't know what to do. I will probably just fucking die.

name: xiaomimi
text: Oh norman, just get the tattoo yourself!

name: spinynorman
text:
I am sure that will get me mad tail like you won't believe.

Of course, before each session of tail-getting there will be at least ten minutes of semi-coherent, drunken explanation about exactly what the fuck that is on my arm. I have zero doubt that in combination with Onstad's artistry, my blatant awesomeness in willing to get a tattoo, and the considerable charm exhibited in my lengthy explanation, the woman in question will actually catch fire from sheer arousal.

name: numberkillinger
text: I am tempted to get a tattoo of Bender on my ass for similar reasons.

name: spinynorman
text: Hahaha, okay, that would be pretty interesting stuff right there.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: Just as long as no one gets close enough to read the binary.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Go for the "Boy goths pee sitting down" tat.

name: charchar
text: A little bit of info on Robert Smith's phone habits

name: nurdbot
text: I wonder what other idolised celebrities Ray has on the phone for falling out with the others.

name: _cheesekayke
text:
Beef: Liv Tyler, Steven Hawking.
Pat: Bono, Ani DiFranco.
Mr. Bear: That tennis player he stalked in his blogs whose name I can't remember.

name: riazm
text:
ACHEWOOD CONTINUITY POLICE!

I think you're referring to Ektarina who was a volleyball player, not tennis. Though I might be getting it all wrong and forgetting a tennis player he had mad crushes on.

Beef: Tori Amos

One of these things is not like the others.

hm, i remember the occasional mention of tori amos, the beach boys, the dead kennedys, and alanis morisette (as well as the 'lyle wins oasis' run), but i reckon you're right.

and for the record, 'sex funeral' is still one of my absolute favorite achewood band names. (^ ^,)

text: A comment left by madrin was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by JohnnyLandmine, ishuta, Lumus, lazarusloafer, Crimson_King, morganization)

text:
I think Onstad may indeed like the Cure, but also hates himself for liking the Cure.

Or perhaps he is simply making fun of ridiculous things.

text: It is possible that he is a man who does not think that your musical taste defines your quality as a person.

text: The Cure are none too bad, however your unironic use of "the bomb" is quite bad

name: greenkoolayd
text: dont you mock the things/people youre fond of?

name: centipede_damascus
text: Ray made a couple of phone calls, and as it turns out, neither he or Teodor are fat! Who knew?

name: rogergs
text: This is another way how a Man apologizes.

name: imitationcrab
text:
The title of this strip (on my computer, anyway) says Tacodor instead of Teodor. tee hee. combination of taco and odor?

I wonder what Ray's voice sounds like doing a non-English version of Robert Smith. I don't think Teodor is buying it for a second. Probably just playing along.

name: toughasnails001
text: My browser can't handle the unicode or whatever and always displays the accented e in Teodor's name as a capital A and a copyright symbol. So: TA(c)odor

name: saru
text: My browser seems to handle it okay, but Assetbar doesn't. It's alright in titles and alt texts, but almost always screwed up in the comments.

name: lucid
text:
That always throws me. I want to imagine Ray is doing a particularly good impression of Robert Smith's voice every time I read this strip, but that is clearly not the case and I can't imagine what Ray doing a bad impression of Robert Smith would be.

Not that I know what Ray is supposed to sound like normally, but I have settled on a voice for it, at least.

name: nathanielperson
text: Robert Smith, for the record, could also stand to lose some weight these days.

name: madnes
text: A double-meaning chubby for you, sir.

name: qingofchina
text: Only Ray could use so much panache.

text: great strip. Just great.

text: I wish I could vote this one a six.

text: Yeah man! Chubs.

such a ridiculous 5

name: goosey
text: I don't use many Achewood quotes in my day-to-day life. Some would say I don't use enough. When talking to my goth friends, however, I have on more than one occasion said "Don't tell me you take a shower now! SO not goth!"

name: ford
text: This strip, like so many others, is vastly enhanced if you read it out loud to yourself.

name: tekende
text: I get the feeling Ray isn't even changing his voice for this at all. And if he is, he's using a girly, high-pitched voice.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Weekend Blogs (Saturday - Monday)

Mr. Bear: Everyone's a pub-namer

name: rowboat
text:
I can't believe "The Dude and Catastrophe" beat out "The Teats and Ass."

Cornelius needs to reevaluate.

name: doc_rostov
text: Dunno, Rowboat. I think The Dude and Catastrophe has some more staying power, you know? The Teats and Ass sounds fun for the first 10 minutes, but it's like that tattoo you get of a band you really really like. Sure, nice for a few years, but when your music tastes change and you start to dislike the band you used t call favorite, you're gonna be slammin' down cold ones to drown the shame away.

name: corpsey
text: Man, I wish I knew who Ray phoned to find out that information. I could sure as hell use knowing that I'm not fat.

name: drago25
text: I really got to remember to always refer to Stellas as being crispy from now on. Hella crispy .

name: maximus
text: and so the plot point of Keith Moon's head is, like him,  suspended in ether indefinitely

name: onepapertiger
text:
I'd forgotten about this strip completely. It's like finding your dad's gun, which is made of money and naked women.

Like the beginnings of Bond movies.

name: hamscout
text:
If this gun shoots scotch I will lay with it and probably get man-pregnant and give birth to an unnaturally handsome child that farts AWESOME.
Ray calling me as Jimmy Page would basically make up for any conceivable rift between us. For this, I would bring the Stellas.

name: deliciousmuffin
text: I love how Ray tries impersonating the lead singer of a band, to try to apologize to his friend... and still feels the need to dick him around by telling him it is not "goth" to shower. Ray is a very special kind of man.

name: mattylite
text: Subtlety of Ray's awesomeness: in the last panel, when he says "thanks for bein the bigger man and gettin' in touch"-- turns out that bigger man was him . Not Robert Smith or T&%*odor, but the big chochacho himself.

name: mustakrakesh
text: "Baths Only" This strip is too much, tooo Muuuch!

name: zapatos
text: I like how, when asked if they were goth, Robert Smith said something akin to, "No."

name: nyl
text: Wow- Ray makes up better than ANYONE.

name: salvar
text:
I need that Baths Only poster.
For my bathroom.

name: philophobe
text:
Yesterday, Robert Smith turned 50.

It is said that Robert Smith celebrates his birthday by hiring a homeless man to play 'Pictures of You' on a rusting musical saw. He sits at the head of a long table set with service for twelve, each plate containing a sole piece of driftwood draped in a wilted daffodil. Eleven seats are empty.

He does not smile, and he does not cry; he slowly spills the contents of a rare bottle of pinot noir onto a crisp white tablecloth. The stain spells:
'N O T Y E T ,
A N O T H E R Y E A R'.

name: mal3
text:
A steak and a crispy stella sounds pretty damn good right now.

Alas, it is leftover green chili stew and killians for me.

name: skviiier
text: I love Ray's response in panel 5, it kinda implies that Teodor asked "Do you know how you know this?" rather than "How do you know this?"
